#summary Mosaic engine that uses Flickr images as tiles.
#labels Featured

= Flickr™ Mosaic =

Choose an image from your hard drive or capture from webcam, then select Flickr™ options for tiling and see how it building your mosaic using photos from Flickr™ service.
Thanks to Flash 10 features we can do all this operations including mosaic save without any server-side sruff.
